basics.name: Erik Escobedo
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a hands-on software architect and full-stack engineer with 16+ years of experience, including 3 years at Google Classroom. I specialize in managing technical debt and transforming legacy complexity into maintainable architecture. I have more than a decade of remote-first experience, bridging the gap between business goals and technical execution, ensuring reliability and performance in every project I'm involved in.
